devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against

files.description: Run a test file with the given file name or in the given directory. To specify multiple names, repeat this argument.

config.description: Configuration file. If not passed, defaults to `playwright.config.ts` or `playwright.config.js` in the current directory.

debug.description: Run tests with Playwright Inspector. Shortcut for `PWDEBUG=1` environment variable and `--timeout=0 --max-failures=1 --headed --workers=1` options.

fail-on-flaky-tests.description: Fails test runs that contain flaky tests. By default flaky tests count as successes.

forbid-only.description: Whether to disallow `test.only`. Useful on CI.

global-timeout.description: Total timeout for the whole test run in milliseconds. By default, there is no global timeout.

grep.description: Only run tests matching this regular expression.

grep-invert.description: Only run tests not matching this regular expression. The opposite of `--grep`. The filter does not apply to the tests from dependency projects, i.e. Playwright will still run all tests from project dependencies.

headed.description: Run tests in headed browsers. Useful for debugging.

ignore-snapshots.description: Whether to ignore snapshots. Use this when snapshot expectations are known to be different, e.g. running tests on Linux against Windows screenshots.

list.description: List all the tests, but do not run them.

max-failures.description: Stop after the first `N` test failures.

no-deps.description: Ignore the dependencies between projects and behave as if they were not specified.

output.description: Directory for artifacts produced by tests.

only-changed.description: Only run test files that have been changed between working tree and "ref". Defaults to running all uncommitted changes with ref=HEAD. Only supports Git.

pass-with-no-tests.description: Allows the test suite to pass when no files are found.

project.description: Only run tests from the specified projects, supports '*' wildcard. Defaults to running all projects defined in the configuration file.

quiet.description: Whether to suppress stdout and stderr from the tests.

reporter.description: Choose a reporter: minimalist `dot`, concise `line` or detailed `list`.

retries.description: The maximum number of retries for flaky tests, defaults to zero (no retries).

shard.description: Shard tests and execute only selected shard, specified in the form `current/all`, 1-based, for example `3/5`.

timeout.description: Maximum timeout in milliseconds for each test.

tsconfig.description: Path to a single tsconfig applicable to all imported files.

ui.description: Run tests in interactive UI mode, with a built-in watch mode.

update-snapshots.description: Whether to update snapshots with actual results instead of comparing them. Use this when snapshot expectations have changed.

workers.description: The maximum number of concurrent worker processes that run in parallel.
